General.Name: ezCaretech Co. LTD
General.Description: ezCaretech Co., LTD, a medical IT professional technology company, provides a range of modules for operations in hospitals in South Korea. The company's solutions include BESTCare 2.0, an EMR/EHR solution that optimizes workflows, enhances patient safety and empowerment, minimizes workload for healthcare professionals, and ensures data sharing. It also offers Behavioral specialized HER, a solution for behavioral health; and Cloud EHR. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
